cta_whatsapp_message: Hello, I am interested in D Villas Jumeira Golf Estate. Please contact me.
project_info_title: Luxury villas with golf course views in Jumeirah Golf Estates
project_info_text:
Dar Global is developing a new, upscale residential community called D Villas at Jumeirah Golf Estates. This exclusive project offers opulent villas with panoramic views of lush golf courses, combining luxury living with the tranquility of green landscapes.

Well-connected to major road networks and close to essential services, D Villas is designed for families and buyers seeking a refined lifestyle in one of Dubai’s most prestigious communities.
amenities_title: Infrastructure and landscaping of the residential complex
project_summary_title: A serene golfside lifestyle by Dar Global
project_summary_subtitle: Exclusive villas in Jumeirah Golf Estates
map_text: D Villas is located in Jumeirah Golf Estates, Dubai — a premium residential community known for world-class golf courses and lush, tranquil surroundings. The area offers convenient access to main road networks, while preserving a calm, green environment ideal for family living.
map_address: Dubai, Jumeirah Golf Estates, DG Villas
footer_tagline: Luxury villas with panoramic golf course views in Jumeirah Golf Estates
